# The `SHA1` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A class that wrap the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sha1">SHA1</a> algorithm. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A class that wrap the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sha1">SHA1</a> algorithm.

Definition at line 26 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sha1-h">SHA1.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### final() {#a17713407b71d8b66d7a4a7685d0b1598}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::array&lt; uint8&#95;t, 20 &gt; SHA1::final ()</>}>
Return the current raw 160-bits <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sha1">SHA1</a> for the digested data since the last call to <a href="#a859ad0642b7522eba6124e9c3302e674">init()</a>.

This call will add data to the internal state and as such is not suited for getting an intermediate result (see <a href="#a7eb2516a7f44fe4a89a56996aab632c9">result()</a>).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sha1-h/#l00043">43</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sha1-h">SHA1.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sha1-cpp/#l00278">278</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sha1-cpp">SHA1.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### init() {#a859ad0642b7522eba6124e9c3302e674}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void SHA1::init ()">
Reinitialize the internal state.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sha1-h/#l00031">31</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sha1-h">SHA1.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sha1-cpp/#l00081">81</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sha1-cpp">SHA1.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### result() {#a7eb2516a7f44fe4a89a56996aab632c9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::array&lt; uint8&#95;t, 20 &gt; SHA1::result ()</>}>
Return the current raw 160-bits <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sha1">SHA1</a> for the digested data since the last call to <a href="#a859ad0642b7522eba6124e9c3302e674">init()</a>.

This is suitable for getting the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sha1">SHA1</a> at any time without invalidating the internal state so that more calls can be made into update.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sha1-h/#l00049">49</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sha1-h">SHA1.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sha1-cpp/#l00288">288</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sha1-cpp">SHA1.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### update() {#a58395fd08227a05b497a31b8a913645b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void SHA1::update (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; uint8&#95;t &gt; Data)</>}>
